item.title: Thankful for Scarves!
item.dc:creator: Jessica Estes
item.content:encoded: Here is a scarf that came in the mail today - beautiful work! I believe that the lady who sent it learned about Threads of Compassion OKC by the news interview that happened months ago. It's so cool how technology makes it possible for people from all over the place to participate in this project!
